text: I love little caesar's.  The have hot and ready pizza as soon as you walk in.  If they have to make it for you it literally takes 5-6 minutes and your order is ready.  Prices are amazing also. They have a lunch deal that's fits anyone's budget. Honestly I don't know how they do it with out going out of business.
